definition[0]: (1980-) a Brazilian football player who has played for the Brazilian national team and for Grêmio, Paris Saint-Germain, and FC Barcelona. He won the World Cup with Brazil in 2002. With Barcelona he won the Spanish Liga title twice and the UEFA Championships League title. His individual awards include FIFA World Player of the Year (2004,2005) and European Footballer of the Year (2005). His full name is Ronaldo de Assís Moreira.
